item.title: PyMOL 的安装、球棍模型设置与图片输出
item.description: 安装 PyMol 使用 Homebrew 安装 PyMol 2.5 brew install pymol 在终端启动 PyMol pymol 为 PyMol 添加图形启动界面 * Step 1: Open the `Automator` app. Create a new document and select "Application"; * Step 2: Left under "Actions Library" select "Utilities" and "Run Shell Script"; * Step 3: Choose "/bin/bash" as a shell; * Step 4: Paste the
